reviews.text: Some of the best soul food in the city very consistent consistency is key food is fantastic
Decided to check out Big Mali's in Linden today. I ordered the 3 bones spare ribs, baked beans, yams, collard greens and macaroni and cheese. The 3 bones...
We had been looking forward to trying this place but missed closing time previously. This time we made it 20 minutes before closing but Big Mal, and 3-man...
